DOC.brief_summary: “ Health ” include physical mental aspect . The evaluation “ Mental Health ” contain four domain : psychophysical health , perceive security living world , mean worth life , satisfaction family-social interaction . We establish Taiwan Mental Health Index scale base literature review expert ’ opinion 2002 . The reliability validity assess satisfactory . This TMHI scale apply nation-wide mental health survey 2002 , 2003 , 2004 . In order evaluate effect mental health promotion activity , research project adopt TMHI scale assessment tool . 300 people recruit study signing inform consent . The general population sample 1076 subject recruited 2004 , comparison sample . The difference 4 dimension MHI analyze two study group . The 300 study subject subcategorized two group low high attendance group . The difference MHI group also statistically examine use independent t-test . The statistical signification set α=0.05 . This study result reference set effective mental health promotion program general public .
